info.title: Cosmos DB
info.description: Azure Cosmos DB Database Service Resource Provider REST API

get.description: List all private endpoint connections on a Cosmos DB account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a specified private endpoint connection.

put.description: Approve or reject a private endpoint connection with a given name.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

200.description: Successfully approved or rejected private endpoint connection.

202.description: Accepted. The private endpoint connection update will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a private endpoint connection with a given name.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

202.description: Accepted. The private endpoint connection delete will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: A list of private endpoint connections

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of a private endpoint connection.

id.description: Resource id of the private endpoint.

PrivateEndpointProperty.description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

actionsRequired.description: Any action that is required beyond basic workflow (approve/ reject/ disconnect)

description.description: The private link service connection description.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionStatePropert.description: Connection State of the Private Endpoint Connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.
